title: Stellarium  MEGA
description:
MonkeyVision  STELLARIUM MultiPlatform MEGA RELEASE
===================================================

Stellarium is a free open source planetarium for your computer. It shows a realistic sky in 3D, just like what you see with the naked eye, binoculars or a telescope.
It is being used in planetarium projectors. Just set your coordinates and go.
Wow Meow, as my Mum used to say.



Features >>> in version 0.9.1

sky
    * default catalogue of over 600,000 stars
    * extra catalogues with more than 210 million stars
    * asterisms and illustrations of the constellations
    * constellations for ten different cultures
    * images of nebulae (full Messier catalogue)
    * realistic Milky Way
    * very realistic atmosphere, sunrise and sunset
    * the planets and their satellites

interface
    * a powerful zoom
    * time control
    * multilingual interface
    * scripting to record and play your own shows
    * fisheye projection for planetarium domes
    * spheric mirror projection for your own dome
    * graphical interface and extensive keyboard control
    * telescope control

visualisation
    * equatorial and azimuthal grids
    * star twinkling
    * shooting stars
    * eclipse simulation
    * skinnable landscapes, now with spheric panorama projection

customisability
* add your own deep sky objects, landscapes, constellation images, scripts...


Super Astronomy Geek Note:
A modified version of Stellarium is used in portable planetarium projectors sold by co-developer
Digitalis Education Solutions. Oodles of coolness,yes?


If you like the idea of sitting down with your loved ones and /or kids and having a nice quiet and secretly educational evening, the Stellarium is for you. Install it on your Laptop and away you go.
Using can actually be quite relaxing.....


A HUMOROUS MONKEY NOTE:

Okay, I&#039;m usually a pretty nice guy, but I&#039;ve been quite down on the French for a while.... Sorry.
I mean, all the French people that I&#039;ve met here were, er, well..... SNOOTY.

That is, until I found the brilliant astronomy program Stellarium.... Written by a brilliant French person, I now embrace the French people with massive gusto.

Vive la bagette! Vive la pomme de terre, mon amis!

A bottle of wine, wedge of cheese, a loaf of fine french bread, and Stellarium for all!

Vive la Stellarium!

( Note: No French people were harmed in the making of this NFO or Stellarium.... )


This is a Multi-Platform MEGA MONKEY RELEASE....

This proggie is just so good that EVERYONE should have it.

I&#039;ll have to break it down into three different Operating System releases , maybe....



Just Download it, you really will love it.

-UncleMonkey777
